> Project Part: Magnetic Field Generator (10/min)
  # Standard: Magnetic Field Generator:
    | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
        - 25 Project Part: Versatile Framework(s)
        - 10 Electromagnetic Control Rod(s)
        - 50 Battery(s)
        - 275 MW(s)
        * 5 Manufacturer(s)
        * 1710 m^2(s) (about 27 foundations minus belt space)
        * 2 steps into the chain from the top.
        ++ 10 Project Part: Magnetic Field Generator per minute
    |- Project Part: Versatile Framework (25/min)
        # Alternate: Flexible Framework:
          | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
              - 12.5 Modular Frame(s)
              - 75 Steel Beam(s)
              - 100 Rubber(s)
              - 110 MW(s)
              * 2 Manufacturer(s)
              * 684 m^2(s) (about 11 foundations minus belt space)
              * 4 steps into the chain from the top.
              ++ 25 Project Part: Versatile Framework per minute
          |- Modular Frame (12.5/min)
